sentences.sContent: And it is from this extended sense of connection that the magnitude of changes, the rapidity of changes, can truly begin to take place.
sentences.sContent_eng: And it is from this extended sense of connection that the magnitude of changes, the rapidity of changes, can truly begin to take place.
sentences.sCn: 并且在这扩展延伸的连接感觉当中强度会发生改变，而且是迅速的改变，这会真实的开始并且发生。

words.tran: 迅速的，急促的；飞快的；险峻的
急流；高速交通工具，高速交通网
